oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Fāṭimah Muḥammad al-Ṭayyib
مقابلة مع فاطمة محمد الطيب
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ghouls and ogres
Expulsion--Palestine--History--20th century
Popular culture--Palestine
Princes--Fiction
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Arab Salvation Army; Beirut (Lebanon); Brothers; Curfew; Death; Displacement; Family structure; Fathers; Hawshah (Palestine); Hostile acts; Illness; Imprisonment; Mortars; Routes; Tal al-Zaʻtar (Palestinian refugee camp: Lebanon); United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East; Water resources; Zionist Invasion of Palestine, 1948; Benevolence; Berbers; Birds; Daughters; Emotions; Greetings; Kings; Mothers; Ogres; Rocks; Seven-headed snakes; Sons; Storytelling; Trees; Brothers; Caves; Death; Dogs; Gold; Jews; Kings; Religious belief; Rocks; Snakes; Talismans; al-Shāṭir Muḥammad; Animal slaughter; Building practices; Daughters; Elderly people; Feasts; Girls; Hiding; Hygiene; Imprisonment; Killing; Kings; Lions; Mayors; Orchards; Prayers; Queens; Roosters; Siblings; Sisters; Sons; Storytelling; Travel; Trees; Unfulfilled promises; Water wells; Castles; Dabkah; Dalʻūnā; Daughters; Ducks; Hiding; Kings; Maiden; Marriage; Musical instruments; Princes; Slaves; Torture; Wedding celebration
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on June, 1995 with Fāṭimah Muḥammad al-Ṭayyib, female, born in 1948 in Hawshah, Palestine and resides in Shātīlā Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع فاطمة محمد الطيب في حزيران يونيو عام 1995، أنثى، ولدت عام 1948 في هوشة، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم شاتيلا للاجئين الفلسطنين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Expulsion from Palestine and socioeconomic conditions in exile . (@ 0:00)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الطرد من فلسطين والظروف الاجتماعية الاقتصادية في المنفى. (@ 0:00)
